title: Here after foloweth certayne bokes, co[m]pyled by mayster Skelton, Poet Laureat whose names here after shall appere. Speke parrot The deth of the noble prince Kyng Edwarde the fourth. A treatyse of the Scottes. Ware the hawke The tunnyng of Elynour Rummynge.
author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.
publisher: By Richard Lant, for Henry Tab, dwelling in Pauls church yard, at the sygne of Iudith,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
